trans-unit.source: Quotas to Manage Protected Data Volumes

seg-source.mrk: Quotas to Manage Protected Data Volumes

target.mrk: Quotas pour gérer les volumes de données protégés

trans-unit.source: Quotas enable you to set limits on certain items to manage the growth of protected data. You'll find information on quotas in the via Agents.

seg-source.mrk: Quotas enable you to set limits on certain items to manage the growth of protected data.
You'll find information on quotas in the via Agents.

target.mrk: Les quotas vous permettent de définir des limites sur certains éléments pour gérer la croissance des données protégées.
Vous trouverez des informations sur les quotas dans la via Agents.

trans-unit.source: Display Agents based on the quota limit

seg-source.mrk: Display Agents based on the quota limit

target.mrk: Afficher les agents en fonction de la limite de quota

trans-unit.source: Go to Agents.

seg-source.mrk: Go to Agents.

target.mrk: Allez dans Agents.

trans-unit.source: Click the More filters button above the list of Agents.

seg-source.mrk: Click the More filters button above the list of Agents.

target.mrk: Cliquez sur le bouton Filtres avancés au-dessus de la liste des agents.

trans-unit.source: Enable quotas.

seg-source.mrk: Enable quotas.

target.mrk: Activer les quotas.

trans-unit.source: Select if agents should be kept whether their quota limit is bigger or smaller than the quota limit set by default.

seg-source.mrk: Select if agents should be kept whether their quota limit is bigger or smaller than the quota limit set by default.

target.mrk: Sélectionnez si les agents doivent être conservés si leur limite de quota est supérieure ou inférieure à la limite de quota définie par défaut.

trans-unit.source: Set the quota limit for agents.

seg-source.mrk: Set the quota limit for agents.

target.mrk: Définissez la limite de quota pour les agents.

trans-unit.source: Set Quotas in the Strategy

seg-source.mrk: Set Quotas in the Strategy

target.mrk: Définir des quotas dans la stratégie

trans-unit.source: Go to Backup > Strategies.

seg-source.mrk: Go to Backup > Strategies.

target.mrk: Allez dans Sauvegarde > Stratégies.

trans-unit.source: Click on a strategy.

seg-source.mrk: Click on a strategy.

target.mrk: Cliquez sur une stratégie.

trans-unit.source: In the Properties tab, set a limit to the protected volume.:

seg-source.mrk: In the Properties tab, set a limit to the protected volume.:

target.mrk: Dans l'onglet Propriétés, définissez une limite pour le volume protégé.

trans-unit.source: To define limits, specify a value and unit for quotas. Quotas are set on the server but apply to each agent individually. For instance, if you limit the protected volume to 100 GB, it implies that no single agent can protect more than 100 GB of data.

seg-source.mrk: To define limits, specify a value and unit for quotas.
Quotas are set on the server but apply to each agent individually.
For instance, if you limit the protected volume to 100 GB, it implies that no single agent can protect more than 100 GB of data.

target.mrk: Pour définir des limites, spécifiez une valeur et une unité pour les quotas.
Les quotas sont définis sur le serveur mais s'appliquent individuellement à chaque agent.
Par exemple, si vous limitez le volume protégé à 100 Go, cela implique qu'aucun agent ne peut protéger à lui seul plus de 100 Go de données.

trans-unit.source: Reach the Quota Limit

seg-source.mrk: Reach the Quota Limit

target.mrk: Atteindre la limite de quota

trans-unit.source: <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> <MadCap:annotation MadCap:createDate="2023-03-01T15:29:40.1484712+01:00" MadCap:creator="lisal" MadCap:initials="LI" MadCap:comment="mettre cette phrase dans une section utiliser les filtres avancés de l'agent: When the limit is reached for a particular quota on an agent, an exclamation mark appears besides the More filters button in the Agents view. " MadCap:editor="lisal" MadCap:editDate="2023-03-01T15:30:07.8896481+01:00" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">performs these operations:</MadCap:annotation>

" MadCap:editor="lisal" MadCap:editDate="2023-03-01T15:30:07.8896481+01:00" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">performs these operations:</MadCap:annotation>

target.mrk: <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> <MadCap:annotation MadCap:createDate="2023-03-01T15:29:40.1484712+01:00" MadCap:creator="lisal" MadCap:initials="LI" MadCap:comment="mettre cette phrase dans une section utiliser les filtres avancés de l'agent: When the limit is reached for a particular quota on an agent, an exclamation mark appears besides the More filters button in the Agents view. " MadCap:editor="lisal" MadCap:editDate="2023-03-01T15:30:07.8896481+01:00" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">effectue ces opérations :</MadCap:annotation>

trans-unit.source: The server refuses to protect any new data.

seg-source.mrk: The server refuses to protect any new data.

target.mrk: Le serveur refuse de protéger toute nouvelle donnée.

trans-unit.source: The backup session in progress is interrupted.

seg-source.mrk: The backup session in progress is interrupted.

target.mrk: La session de sauvegarde en cours est interrompue.

trans-unit.source: The agent repository is disabled.

seg-source.mrk: The agent repository is disabled.

target.mrk: L'espace de stockage d'agents est désactivé.

trans-unit.source: An alert is displayed on the server for the agent whose quota is reached.

seg-source.mrk: An alert is displayed on the server for the agent whose quota is reached.

target.mrk: Une alerte apparaît sur le serveur pour l'agent dont le quota est atteint.

trans-unit.source: The agent database becomes unavailable for 20 minutes before a new protection session starts.

seg-source.mrk: The agent database becomes unavailable for 20 minutes before a new protection session starts.

target.mrk: La base de données de l'agent devient indisponible pendant 20 minutes avant qu'une nouvelle session de protection ne démarre.

trans-unit.source: Due to optimization reason, the quota verification occurs at scheduled time intervals. As a result, an agent could be temporarily reaching a limit without triggering an alert.

seg-source.mrk: Due to optimization reason, the quota verification occurs at scheduled time intervals.
As a result, an agent could be temporarily reaching a limit without triggering an alert.

target.mrk: Pour des raisons d'optimisation, la vérification des quotas a lieu à des intervalles de temps réguliers.
En conséquence, un agent pourrait temporairement atteindre une limite sans déclencher d'alerte.

trans-unit.source: Resume Protection

seg-source.mrk: Resume Protection

target.mrk: Reprendre la protection

trans-unit.source: When an agent has reached the limit set for a quota, certain actions enable you to resume protection on the agent, for instance:

seg-source.mrk: When an agent has reached the limit set for a quota, certain actions enable you to resume protection on the agent, for instance:

target.mrk: Lorsqu'un agent a atteint la limite définie pour un quota, certaines actions vous permettent de reprendre la protection sur l'agent, par exemple :

trans-unit.source: Increase the value of the quota.

seg-source.mrk: Increase the value of the quota.

target.mrk: Augmenter la valeur du quota.

trans-unit.source: Modify the server or agent rules, to protect fewer files or folders, or avoid protecting files that are too big.

seg-source.mrk: Modify the server or agent rules, to protect fewer files or folders, or avoid protecting files that are too big.

target.mrk: Modifier les règles du serveur ou de l'agent pour protéger moins de fichiers ou de dossiers, ou bien éviter de protéger des fichiers trop volumineux.

trans-unit.source: Delete files on the agent.

seg-source.mrk: Delete files on the agent.

target.mrk: Supprimer des fichiers sur l'agent.

trans-unit.source: Reduce the retention period.

seg-source.mrk: Reduce the retention period.

target.mrk: Réduire la période de rétention.

trans-unit.source: The quota reached status is removed when a full protection session completes on the agent without reaching any limit.

seg-source.mrk: The quota reached status is removed when a full protection session completes on the agent without reaching any limit.

target.mrk: Le statut de quota atteint est retiré dès lors qu'une session de protection complète se termine sur l'agent sans atteindre de limite.

trans-unit.source: View Information on Quotas

seg-source.mrk: View Information on Quotas

target.mrk: Consulter les informations sur les quotas

trans-unit.source: To view information on quotas in the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />

seg-source.mrk: To view information on quotas in the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />

target.mrk: Pour afficher les informations sur les quotas dans la <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />

trans-unit.source: Go to the list of Agents.

seg-source.mrk: Go to the list of Agents.

target.mrk: Allez dans la liste des agents.

trans-unit.source: Click the button to display one of the following columns in the list of agents:

seg-source.mrk: Click the button to display one of the following columns in the list of agents:

target.mrk: Cliquez sur le bouton pour afficher une des colonnes suivantes dans la liste des agents.

trans-unit.source: Quota: Threshold set by the superadmin to protect volumes on agents.

seg-source.mrk: Quota: Threshold set by the superadmin to protect volumes on agents.

target.mrk: Quota : seuil défini par le superadmin pour protéger les volumes sur les agents.

trans-unit.source: Used quota: Percentage of quota used.

seg-source.mrk: Used quota: Percentage of quota used.

target.mrk: Quota utilisé : pourcentage de quota utilisé.
